meanings.definition: A genre of electronic dance music characterized by syncopated rhythms and heavy bass.
meanings.sent1: The club played dubstep all night, and everyone danced to the heavy beats.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to dubstep while working out at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The aliens landed on Earth and started dancing to the dubstep music.
meanings.sent4: The dubstep music was a thunderstorm of bass and rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The dubstep concert was like a musical earthquake, shaking the whole venue.

meanings.definition: To remix a song by adding elements of dubstep music.
meanings.sent1: She decided to dubstep the latest pop song to give it a fresh twist.
meanings.sent2: The DJ promised to dubstep the classic track for the party.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to dubstep the recipe by adding unusual ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His remix dubstepped the original song into a whole new level of cool.
meanings.sent5: The band dubstepped their hit single, surprising their fans with a new sound.
